title: State to make special efforts to increase software exports: Himachal minister Rajesh Dharmani
description: Special efforts would be made to increase software export from Himachal Pradesh from Rs 5 crore to Rs 100 crore, said the minister who visited Hamirpur for the first time after taking oath as a minister of the state's Cabinet on December 12.
content: Himachal Pradesh will make special efforts to increase the state's software exports from Rs 5 crore to Rs 100 crore, Cabinet minister Rajesh Dharmani said on Sunday.
cleaned_content: himachal pradesh will make special efforts to increase the states software exports from rs <FIVE_> crore to rs <ONE_HUNDRED> crore cabinet minister rajesh dharmani said on sunday
